Would you like to send KaiOS a report about the crash to help us fix the problem? (Reports are sent over Wi-Fi only.)
Always send KaiOS a report when a crash occurs.
A crash report contains some details about the crash and your device, as well as a snapshot of the status of your device when it crashed.
This may include things like open pages and apps, text typed into forms and the content of open messages, recent browsing history, or geolocation used by an open app.
We use crash reports to try to fix problems and improve our products. We handle your information as we describe in our

A SIM PIN is not the same as the passcode used to unlock the device.

KaiOS Account provides authentication for KaiOS services.  The account identifies the user and device and allows access to features such as remote management of devices and additional services.

Creating an account requires an email address and a password.  The user must verify the email address via an email link sent during account creation.  The account will not be activated until this email address is verified.
By proceeding with account creation, you agree to the terms and privacy notice.
